summary.description:
Experience timeless luxury at Purva Orient Grand.
Set in the heart of old Bengaluru, just moments from the iconic Lalbagh Botanical Garden, this ultra-premium address blends historic charm with contemporary sophistication. Thoughtfully crafted 3 BHK and expansive 4 BHK residences offer generous spaces, refined detailing, and uninterrupted views?designed for those who value elegance, privacy, and legacy living.

Every element reflects understated grandeur. From sprawling private decks overlooking serene gardens to a world-class rooftop clubhouse designed by Singapore-based architect Andy Fisher, life here is curated at the highest level. The 25th-floor infinity pool rises above the city skyline, while exclusive social spaces create an atmosphere of quiet prestige and meaningful connection.

Purva Orient Grand is more than a residence?it is a rare statement of cultural richness and refined living, redefining luxury apartments on Lalbagh Road for a discerning few.
highlights: Only 97 ultra-luxury residences across a private 1.15-acre enclave
Zero shared walls ensuring complete privacy and seclusion
Expansive private decks designed for serene, uninterrupted living
Limited-edition 3 & 4 BHK residences with grand proportions
Art-led interiors & refined architectural detailing throughout
Intuitive home automation for effortless, modern living
Victorian-inspired Rose & Cypress Club for exclusive social experiences
Al fresco party deck at the top for curated gatherings
Single iconic tower rising G + 24 floors

aboutBuilder.name: purva

meta.title: About the Developer
meta.subtitle: A trusted name with a proven track record in delivering quality homes
meta.tagline: Built on credibility. Known for consistency.

aboutBuilder.description: Puravankara Limited, headquartered in Bengaluru, is one of India?s most admired and trusted home builders and is recognized among the top real estate companies in India, with a legacy of excellence spanning over 50 years. Founded in 1975, the company is known for delivering high-quality homes on time with complete transparency.
aboutBuilder.descriptionExpanded: Puravankara has launched three prominent brands, each catering to distinct market segments. Puravankara itself is recognized for its luxurious, state-of-the-art projects that incorporate innovative technology to redefine future homes. Provident Housing Ltd., a wholly-owned subsidiary launched in 2008, addresses the needs of mid-income homeowners. Purva Land, established in 2021, offers a lucrative investment opportunity through plotted developments, responding to the evolving needs of homebuyers. Additionally, Starworth Infrastructure and Construction Limited (SICL) provides technology-enabled construction solutions. Puravankara also has a strong presence in commercial office spaces.

meta.title: Frequently Asked Questions
meta.subtitle: Everything you need to know before making a decision

faqs.title: Where is Purva Orient Grand located?
items: Purva Orient Grand is located on Lalbagh Road in the prestigious heart of Bengaluru, offering easy access to cultural landmarks, premium retail destinations, and key commercial hubs.

faqs.title: What types of homes are available at Purva Orient Grand?
items: Purva Orient Grand offers limited edition **3 & 4 BHK ultra-luxury residences**, designed for high net worth individuals seeking expansive living spaces, privacy, and architectural excellence.

faqs.title: How exclusive is Purva Orient Grand?
items: Purva Orient Grand is a rare boutique address with just **97 ultra-luxury residences** and **zero shared walls**, ensuring absolute privacy and a private community feel.

faqs.title: How many towers and floors does Purva Orient Grand have?
items: The development comprises **1 iconic tower** rising to **G + 24 floors**, creating an elegant, skyline presence.

faqs.title: What makes Purva Orient Grand different from other luxury projects in Bengaluru?
items: Purva Orient Grand distinguishes itself with private decks for every residence, artistic flourishes, intuitive home automation, exclusive lifestyle spaces like the Rose & Cypress Club, and an al fresco party area with skyline views.

faqs.title: Who is the developer of Purva Orient Grand?
items: Purva Orient Grand is developed by :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}, a reputed developer with a strong legacy in crafting premium and luxury residential communities.

faqs.title: Is Purva Orient Grand suitable for professionals and families?
items: Yes. Its premier location, luxurious design, and private living environment make it ideal for both discerning professionals and families who value exclusivity and quality.

faqs.title: What amenities are available at Purva Orient Grand?
items: Amenities include an exclusive rooftop infinity pool, the Victorian-inspired Rose & Cypress Club, al fresco party deck, landscaped gardens, wellness spaces, and curated social areas that match an ultra-luxury lifestyle.

faqs.title: What is the price range of apartments at Purva Orient Grand?
items: Ultra-luxury 3 & 4 BHK residences at Purva Orient Grand are priced from **?6.00 Cr onwards***, depending on configuration and floor level.

faqs.title: Is Purva Orient Grand a good long-term investment?
items: Yes. With its limited inventory, iconic location, ultra-luxury positioning, and strong brand backing, Purva Orient Grand offers potential for long-term value appreciation and prestige.

faqs.title: Does Purva Orient Grand offer good rental potential?
items: Yes. Ultra-luxury residences in HSR and Lalbagh Road areas attract senior executives, business leaders, and premium tenants, supporting high rental yields.

faqs.title: Is Purva Orient Grand RERA approved?
items: Yes. Purva Orient Grand is RERA registered, ensuring regulatory compliance, transparency, and buyer protection as per applicable norms.

faqs.title: Are these homes suitable for end users or investors?
items: Ultra-luxury homes at Purva Orient Grand are ideal for end users seeking refined living and privacy, and also suitable for investors targeting premium rental demand and long-term capital appreciation.

faqs.title: How can I book a private site visit or get detailed pricing?
items: You can request a private, appointment-based site visit, receive detailed pricing, floor plans, and personalised assistance through PropYouLike.
